translation.en: [man in Chichewa] Father!
[man] John! John!
[man, in English] No one is responsible for the death of this man.
translation.it: Nessuno è responsabile per la morte di quest'uomo.

translation.en: God alone has decided to take John Kamkwamba.
translation.it: Dio ha deciso di prendere John Kamkwamba.

translation.en: When God has decided, then we will know the man by what remains.
translation.it: Quando Dio decide, a noi resta ciò che quest'uomo ha lasciato.

translation.en: By the fruit shall we know the tree.
And we have fruit here.
The fruit of the land farmed by John and his younger brother, Trywell,
translation.it: I frutti della terra coltivata da John e dal suo fratello minore, Trywell,

translation.en: since they returned from Dowa nearly 20 years ago,
translation.it: dal loro ritorno da Dowa, quasi 20 anni fa,

translation.en: and worked this land together side by side, these two brothers.
translation.it: e questi due fratelli hanno lavorato questa terra fianco a fianco.

translation.en: But there are other fruits from John Kamkwamba,
translation.it: Ma John Kamkwamba ha lasciato anche altri frutti.

translation.en: many offspring born to him.
His children, led by his eldest son, Jeremiah,
translation.it: I suoi figli, guidati dal maggiore, Jeremiah,

translation.en: who must now take over the work of his departed father.
translation.it: che ora dovrà prendersi carico del lavoro del padre scomparso.

translation.en: -And if the fruit is good, then it must... -[chanting]
translation.it: E se i frutti sono buoni, allora...

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Give me my radio.
Did you fix Mr. Bamusi's? No, sir. Not yet.
translation.it: -Hai aggiustato quella del Sig. Bamusi? -No, non ancora.

translation.en: Go and check the roof.
[woman in Chichewa] There are heavy cloud formations moving across the southwest...
translation.it: Ci sono pesanti formazioni nuvolose in arrivo da sud-ovest...

translation.en: -[in Chichewa] Morning, Papa. -Sleep better?
[whispers in Chichewa] Put it on his bed.
-[man] Good morning. -[woman] Good morning to you.
-Bad dreams again? -Yes, hardly slept.
translation.it: -Ancora brutti sogni? -Sì, faccio fatica a dormire.

translation.en: William! You want Shabani to help you?
translation.it: William! Vuoi che Shabani ti aiuti?

translation.en: No, Ma. I'm fine.
[in English] William, where's my radio?
[in English] Mr. Bamusi, please, just a few more days.
translation.it: Sig. Bamusi, la prego, mi dia qualche altro giorno.

translation.en: I'm finding the problem. It's not the condenser.
translation.it: Sto cercando il problema, non è il condensatore.

translation.en: I've told your father. I'm missing my programs, William.
translation.it: L'ho detto a tuo padre. Mi sto perdendo i miei programmi, William.

translation.en: William, if you can't fix it,
translation.it: William, se non riesci ad aggiustarla,

translation.en: you have to give Mr. Bamusi back his money.
translation.it: dovresti ridare i soldi al Sig. Bamusi.

translation.en: A few days, Mr. Bamusi. I promise.
translation.it: Solo qualche altro giorno, Sig. Bamusi. Promesso.

translation.en: He's forcing me to come back from work and talk to my wife and children.
translation.it: Mi obbliga a dover parlare con mia moglie e i miei figli al ritorno dal lavoro.

translation.en: [chuckles] William. [in Chichewa] Make sure you wash before you go inside.
[in Chichewa] Yes, Ma.
[William] Papa! Papa!
[in Chichewa] Thank you, Papa! Thank you!
Oh, my God! Where is my son? Who has taken my son?
translation.it: Oh mio Dio! Dov'è finito mio figlio? Chi se l'è portato via?

translation.en: -Look at the trousers! -It's okay. It's okay.
Who brought this man here?
Doesn't he know that I love my husband?
translation.it: Non lo sa che io amo mio marito?

translation.en: Leave the boy alone.
Is he a doctor from Lilongwe or an engineer from Chimamba?
translation.it: Sei un medico di Lilongwe o un ingegnere di Chimamba?

translation.en: -It's not too big? -It's perfect.
Dear Father,
we thank you for all the blessings you have laid on this family.
translation.it: ti ringraziamo per aver benedetto questa famiglia.

translation.en: Please continue to fight for us, so we may endure any hardship.
translation.it: Ti prego, continua a combattere per noi, affinché possiamo affrontare le difficoltà.

translation.en: -In Jesus's name, Amen. -Amen.
When I was a boy, the elders sometimes hadn't recorded everyone's exact age.
translation.it: Quando ero piccolo, gli anziani non registravano l'età esatta.

translation.en: But there was a simple test.
If you could touch your left ear over your head with your right hand,
translation.it: Se riuscivi a toccare l'orecchio sinistro con la mano destra da sopra la testa,

translation.en: you could go to school. [chuckles]
The first time I tried, I was too small.
translation.it: La prima volta che ci provai ero troppo piccolo.

translation.en: I couldn't reach.
Do it.
That was for you to go to primary school, Papa.
translation.it: Questa prova era per quando tu andavi alle elementari, papà.

translation.en: -Of course I can do it. -I know.
translation.it: -È ovvio che io ci arrivo. -Lo so.

translation.en: Go to school.
-[in English] Looking sharp, man. -You too, man. [laughs]
[Gilbert] I think this is a bit too loose for you.
translation.it: Però credo che ti siano un po' grandi.

translation.en: -[William] Room to grow, room to grow. -[both laugh]
[in Chichewa] One phosphorus, one more organic.
translation.it: Uno al fosforo e uno biologico.

translation.en: -You want an ox cart? -No, I brought the bike.
translation.it: -Vuoi un carro di buoi? -No, ho comprato una bicicletta.

translation.en: There's flooding in Mozambique.
Mozambique?
I've heard it on the radio.
[in Chichewa] Justina's relatives found her a job at the agricultural ministry.
translation.it: I genitori di Justina le hanno trovato un lavoro nel Ministero dell'Agricoltura.

translation.en: Don't worry.
After university, you'll have no problem finding a job.
translation.it: Dopo l'università, non avrai problemi a trovare lavoro.

translation.en: You'll do things even I didn't think women could do.
translation.it: Farai cose che nemmeno immaginavi potessi fare, in quanto donna.

translation.en: [crowd chanting in Chichewa] N.U.P. government! N.U.P. government!
Another six months of this bullshit.
translation.it: Altri sei mesi di questa stronzata.

translation.en: You know the president is even coming to Kasungu.
translation.it: Verrà anche il Presidente a Kasungu.

translation.en: Democracy.
Democracy is just like imported cassava.
translation.it: La democrazia è come una tapioca importata.

translation.en: It rots quickly.
[in English] Of course, Kachokolo is not the wealthiest school in the district,
translation.it: Certamente la Kachokolo non è la scuola più ricca del distretto,

translation.en: but it's down to each one of you to decide your own level of commitment.
translation.it: ma sta ad ognuno di voi decidere il proprio livello di impegno.

translation.en: -Your own level of what? -[pupils] Commitment!
We have had students excel in their junior certificate
translation.it: Abbiamo avuto eccellenti studenti all'esame di terza media,

translation.en: and some of them have even gone on to university.
translation.it: e alcuni di loro sono perfino andati all'università.

translation.en: Did these people have two heads?
-[pupils] No, Mr. Headmaster. -[thunder rumbling]
-What did they not have? -[pupils] Two heads!
[headmaster] They worked hard. Simple as that. What did they do?
translation.it: Hanno lavorato duramente. Semplicemente. Cos'hanno fatto?

translation.en: [pupils] Worked hard.
When we have received the full payment for the term,
translation.it: Quando riceveremo il pagamento completo per il quadrimestre,

translation.en: you will receive your library card from Mrs. Sikelo.
translation.it: vi verrà consegnata la tessera della biblioteca dalla Sig.a Sikelo.

translation.en: -[wind whistling] -What will I give you?
[pupils] Library cards.
Your library cards will allow you to take some books home overnight.
translation.it: La tessera della biblioteca vi permetterà di portarvi a casa alcuni libri.

translation.en: So, with dedication, there's no reason--
translation.it: Quindi, con impegno, non ci sono scuse...

translation.en: Everybody, go to your form rooms.
Your form teachers will take you through the rest of the day's activities.
translation.it: I vostri insegnanti vi spiegheranno il resto delle attività della giornata.

translation.en: [man] Everybody, find your seat. Find your seat.
Your first day of school and the rains have come.
translation.it: Il vostro primo giorno di scuola è arrivato con la pioggia.

translation.en: A good sign, I wonder.
My name is Mr. Kachigunda.
I will be your form tutor and science teacher for the year.
translation.it: Sarò il vostro tutor e insegnante di scienze quest'anno.

translation.en: -Good morning. -[pupils] Good morning, Mr. Kachigunda.
Take your seats.
Okay, let's get right on with it. Basic algebra: x and y.
translation.it: Ok, iniziamo subito. Algebra di base: la x e la y.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Mr. Godsten.
Mama said that Justina left for Lilongwe.
translation.it: Mia madre ha detto che Justina è partita per Lilongwe.

translation.en: Yes, she's gone.
Do you need help here?
Not any we can afford.
Will you let me know if you hear of any work in the market?
translation.it: Mi può informare se qualcuno cerca aiuto al mercato?

translation.en: Of course.
[William] Mr. Kachigunda.
[in English] It's from my sister, Annie, for her university placement.
translation.it: È da parte di mia sorella Annie, per l'ammissione all'Università.

translation.en: You're William Kamkwamba?
Yes, sir.
Tell your father to pay the fees.
translation.it: Di' a tuo padre di pagare la retta.

translation.en: He's paid, sir.
Only the down payment. There's no grace period here.
translation.it: Solo la caparra. Non facciamo proroghe qui.

translation.en: Tell your father to pay the rest or you won't be allowed to come to school.
translation.it: Di' a tuo padre di pagare il resto o non potrai venire a scuola.

translation.en: Yes, sir. He'll pay, sir.
Good.
William, look who's been waiting.
translation.it: William, guarda chi ti sta aspettando.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] William, it's too dark.
We have a science test.
-Can I use kerosene? -There's not enough for studying.
translation.it: -Posso usare il cherosene? -Non ce n'è abbastanza per studiare.

translation.en: Go and help your father plant.
translation.it: Vai ad aiutare tuo padre a piantare.

translation.en: [in English] That's okay.
You need to see me after class.
William, you can do better. Gilbert, I'm not so sure.
translation.it: William, puoi fare di meglio. Gilbert, non ne sono sicuro.

translation.en: That's good.
-[Gilbert] At least you passed. -[William] Sixty-two is not enough.
translation.it: -Almeno tu sei passato. -Sessantadue non è abbastanza.

translation.en: We need to go to the junkyard. We need to find a way to study at night.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare alla discarica. Dobbiamo riuscire a studiare di notte.

translation.en: [William] There's been a delivery.
[Gilbert] It's just more shit from the tobacco estate.
translation.it: C'è più schifezza qui che alla tenuta di tabacco.

translation.en: [Gilbert] Anything new?
It's a pump.
Hey!
[man] When the tobacco estates moved south,
translation.it: Quando la tenuta di tabacco si è trasferita al sud,

translation.en: it made it hard for us to compete to grow tobacco.
translation.it: per noi è diventato difficile competere nel coltivare il tabacco.

translation.en: And then they took the trees to burn to dry their tobacco leaves.
translation.it: E poi ci hanno preso gli alberi da bruciare per far seccare le foglie di tabacco.

translation.en: We once had a beautiful country that my son will never see.
translation.it: Una volta avevamo un paese bellissimo, che mio figlio non vedrà mai.

translation.en: [man 2] We have been instructed by the estate
to offer 2,000 kwacha per tonne of forestry.
translation.it: di offrire 2.000 kwacha per ogni tonnellata di foresta.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Papa, what's going on? They're taking the trees?
translation.it: Papà, cosa succede? Stanno parlando degli alberi?

translation.en: Who said you could come to the meeting?
translation.it: Chi ha detto che potevi venire alla riunione?

translation.en: Gilbert is allowed.
[Trywell] And so? Go!
Go!
[man 2 in English] Of course, if you don't want to take this opportunity,
translation.it: Certamente, se non vogliamo cogliere questa opportunità,

translation.en: we will be forced to take our business elsewhere.
translation.it: saremo obbligati a fare il nostro lavoro altrove.

translation.en: [man 2] Let the chief speak. Let the chief speak.
Of course, the estates know that the rains came late this year,
translation.it: I proprietari sanno che quest'anno le piogge sono arrivate tardi,

translation.en: and they have come heavy.
They know that there has been flooding in Mozambique.
They know that without finances, we can't build proper defenses,
translation.it: Sanno che senza finanze non possiamo avere difese adeguate,

translation.en: and so we rely on the trees.
They watch for every pressure on us small people,
translation.it: Fanno pressione sulle persone come noi

translation.en: so they can take from us.
The only power we have is to say no.
translation.it: L'unico potere che abbiamo è dire di no.

translation.en: This is a gross mischaracterization of the estate's agenda.
translation.it: Questa è un'interpretazione esagerata del programma della tenuta.

translation.en: We want to work with you people.
[man 3] I'll sign.
-Company man, I will sign. -For 2,000?
-[man 3] I'll sign. -Jeremiah.
Listen to the chief. Two thousand is not enough.
translation.it: Ascoltate il capo. Duemila non sono abbastanza.

translation.en: [in English] The chief can decide his own. I can decide my own.
translation.it: Il capo decide per sé, io posso decidere per me.

translation.en: This is madness. We need the money. I will sign.
translation.it: È follia. Ci servono i soldi. Io firmo.

translation.en: Who else will sign with Jeremiah?
We can only guarantee this price for today.
translation.it: Possiamo garantirvi questo prezzo solo per oggi.

translation.en: [whispers] Jeremiah.
[man 2] Think of your families.
[in Chichewa] I'll sign.
[man 4] I'll sign.
[Trywell in Chichewa] These trees protect us from flooding.
translation.it: Gli alberi ci proteggono dalle alluvioni.

translation.en: Why do you think your father never sold them?
translation.it: Perché pensi che tuo padre non li abbia mai venduti?

translation.en: We'll make more money this way.
translation.it: Faremo un po' di soldi così!

translation.en: There's flooding in Mozambique.
Mozambique?
I have debts in Kasungu.
translation.it: Io ho dei debiti a Kasungu.

translation.en: Then stop gambling.
Don't worry, Uncle Trywell.
I'll support you and your family, just like my father did.
translation.it: Supporterò te e la tua famiglia, proprio come fece mio padre.

translation.en: You keep spending your money educating your kids,
translation.it: Continua a spendere soldi per educare i tuoi figli,

translation.en: just so they can leave you.
The smart ones will get the hell out of here.
translation.it: Quelli più intelligenti scapperanno da qui.

translation.en: And I promise you,
when I have enough money to go,
translation.it: che quando avrò abbastanza soldi per andarmene via

translation.en: I'll give you my land.
I don't want your land.
Then my father was right...
not to leave it to you.
There's nothing wrong with gambling.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di male nelle scommesse.

translation.en: Look at how these rains have been these last few years.
translation.it: Guarda le piogge cadute negli ultimi anni.

translation.en: We're all gambling.
-[dog whines] -[whispers in English] Stay, Khamba.
[man in Chichewa] I asked her why they would send a beautiful woman down here.
translation.it: Le ho chiesto perché avessero mandato una donna così bella quaggiù.

translation.en: She started smiling like this...
So, what happened?
What did you do with her?
You people let children in here now?
He's got brains.
So? How can I talk in front of children?
translation.it: Quindi? Non puoi parlare di fronte ai bambini!

translation.en: Which children?
What do you know about women?
I know absolutely everything you know.
[man] What is it?
I told you. These batteries are dying.
translation.it: Te l'avevo detto. Le batterie stavano morendo.

translation.en: -You have more? -They're all dead.
The game's starting. What do we do now?
translation.it: Sta per iniziare la partita. Cosa facciamo?

translation.en: [mother in Chichewa] Annie, is that you?
[William] No.
Papa.
Should I take my fees with me to school tomorrow morning?
translation.it: Posso avere i soldi per la retta da portare domani a scuola?

translation.en: When the rains stop,
and we're sure of the harvest, we'll pay the fees.
translation.it: e saremo sicuri del raccolto, allora pagheremo.

translation.en: -But sir-- -You were at the meeting.
They're taking down the trees.
The land could flood.
[William in English] Radios use a lot of power,
so when the batteries die, there's usually a bit of juice at the end.
translation.it: quindi quando le batterie muoiono, c'è sempre un po' di rimanenza alla fine.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] So if we put a few dead ones together...
[newsreader in English] ...took place at 8:46 a.m.
And the second plane struck the South Tower
translation.it: Mentre il secondo aereo si è schiantato contro la Torre Sud

translation.en: at 9:03 a.m. Eastern Standard Time.
translation.it: alle 9:03, fuso orario della costa occidentale.

translation.en: -The American president, George W. Bush... -Find the game!
translation.it: -Il Presidente Americano, George W. Bush... -Trova la partita!

translation.en: [Gilbert in English] Look! Look!
-[Annie laughs] -It's Mr. Kachigunda and your sister.
translation.it: È il Sig. Kachigunda con tua sorella.

translation.en: Did you know?
-You can't tell anyone about this. -[Gilbert] I won't.
translation.it: -Non devi dirlo a nessuno. -Non lo farò.

translation.en: [Gilbert] What are you going to do?
You can't just let him get away with it.
What if he disgraces her and tells everybody?
translation.it: E se la disonora e lo dice a tutti?

translation.en: Let me check the car battery.
translation.it: Fammi controllare la batteria della macchina.

translation.en: -It's dead. -Let me check.
Is that how she was able to attend senior classes?
translation.it: È così che è riuscita a seguire le lezioni delle superiori?

translation.en: What do you mean?
He was her teacher.
He must have helped her.
That's why she got the grades for university,
translation.it: Ecco perché ha ricevuto i voti necessari per l'Università

translation.en: and we're struggling even to get a junior certificate.
translation.it: mentre noi facciamo fatica ad ottenere la terza media.

translation.en: She got good grades because she studied at night.
translation.it: Ha ottenuto quei voti perché ha studiato di notte.

translation.en: I remember. We had had money for kerosene back then.
translation.it: Me lo ricordo. Avevamo i soldi per il cherosene all'epoca.

translation.en: You could use this.
To do what?
If you break his bike, you think he'll walk all the way to the village?
translation.it: Se gli rompi la bicicletta non tornerà al villaggio a piedi, no?

translation.en: -It's this one. -Yeah, that's it.
-I can't. -Huh?
Take the light.
Take it, and then you'll be able to study at night.
translation.it: Prendila, così potrai studiare di notte.

translation.en: It's not coming off.
Turn the pedal.
Stop.
Start again.
-[in Chichewa] I had 5,200. -Is that everything?
William's schooling?
[Trywell] After the harvest.
[mother] He needs schooling, Trywell.
You want him spending time with those useless boys?
translation.it: Vuoi che passi il suo tempo con quei ragazzi inutili?

translation.en: His mind is just like Annie's.
-Like my mother's. -[Trywell] Your mother's? That mad woman.
Was it madness when she came and built the extension?
translation.it: Era matta quando ci ha ampliato la casa?

translation.en: Making bricks all day at her age is what killed her.
translation.it: È stato fare mattoni tutti i giorni alla sua età ad averla uccisa.

translation.en: And we still use it.
The children get it from her.
translation.it: I ragazzi hanno preso da lei.

translation.en: From my side.
Not from mine?
You're clever enough. You found me, didn't you?
translation.it: Tu sei abbastanza intelligente. Hai trovato me, no?

translation.en: That was just luck. [chuckling]
Just because you were in the marketplace that time.
translation.it: Solo perché eri al mercato quella volta.

translation.en: We need to save everything we can.
There's no money for school fees.
translation.it: Non ci sono soldi per la retta scolastica.

translation.en: Not right now.
[headmaster in English] Phiri, Nyangu, Kamchulu,
Kamkwamba, and Nkhoma.
If your name has been called, please stay here.
translation.it: Se siete stati chiamati, restate qui.

translation.en: Everyone else, go to class.
Your school fees have still not been paid.
translation.it: La vostra retta risulta ancora non pagata.

translation.en: There is no grace period.
Please go home and collect the fees if you wish to continue your studies.
translation.it: Andate a casa e prendete i soldi della retta se volete continuare gli studi.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] I'll go to the auction house. I'll talk to Daniel Ngwata.
translation.it: Andrò alla casa d'asta. Parlerò con Daniel Ngwata.

translation.en: You haven't seen him for years.
Maybe he can talk to the estate.
translation.it: Forse lui può parlare con i proprietari.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] How do you know this man, Papa?
An old friend.
[man] Trywell.
-[in English] So long. Too long. -Good to see you.
Is this big man William? Wow. It's been too long.
translation.it: Questo giovanotto è William? Wow, è davvero passato tanto tempo.

translation.en: This way, please.
I have some small savings from when we were in business in Dowa.
translation.it: Ho un po' di risparmi da quell'affare in Dowa.

translation.en: But I can use some of it to buy back the trees on Kamkwamba land
translation.it: Ma posso usarne un po' per ricomprare gli alberi di Kamkwamba

translation.en: for the price they were bought for.
They won't do that.
No, if you tell them the land is flooding.
translation.it: No, devi dire loro che la terra è sommersa d'acqua.

translation.en: We're losing the harvest.
Trywell, they won't do that. Why would they do that?
translation.it: Trywell, non lo permetteranno. Perché dovrebbero?

translation.en: Jeremiah sold the trees.
Why didn't your brother leave you that land?
translation.it: Perché tuo fratello non ti ha lasciato la terra?

translation.en: -You worked hard on that land. -I don't know.
He should have left it to you to take care of the family.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto lasciartela affinché ti prendessi cura della famiglia.

translation.en: It was John's land to leave to whoever he wants to leave it to.
translation.it: Era la terra di John e l'ha lasciata a chi voleva.

translation.en: The Pope. [laughing]
The Pope.
That's what we used to call your father back then.
The most honest man in all of Dowa market.
translation.it: L'uomo più onesto del mercato di Dowa.

translation.en: We used to laugh at him
because what good can come from an honest businessman?
translation.it: perché cosa può fare di buono un onesto uomo d'affari?

translation.en: We used to laugh at him, until he had carried off
translation.it: Ridevamo di lui finché non ci ha portato via

translation.en: the most beautiful woman in the whole place.
translation.it: la donna più bella di tutte.

translation.en: For farming.
[in Chichewa] For farming.
[in English] How is Agnes?
Can you help us, Daniel?
The rains, Trywell.
What can anybody do about these rains?
This year, the land is too wet. Next year, too dry.
translation.it: Quest'anno la terra è troppo bagnata. Il prossimo anno, troppo secca.

translation.en: You can't do business like that.
translation.it: Non si possono fare affari così.

translation.en: All indications have been that the grain harvest
translation.it: Tutte le indicazioni dicono che il raccolto di grano

translation.en: would be good this year.
Even the International Monetary Fund, the World Bank,
translation.it: Anche il Fondo Monetario Internazionale, la Banca Mondiale,

translation.en: told the government to sell all the excess grain
translation.it: hanno detto al governo di vendere l'eccesso del raccolto

translation.en: to Mozambique and Kenya.
translation.it: per il Mozambico e il Kenya.

translation.en: And so they did.
Now what's happened? The floods have come.
translation.it: Adesso cos'è accaduto? Sono arrivate le alluvioni.

translation.en: And no one knows if there is enough grain in this whole country
translation.it: E nessuno sa se c'è abbastanza grano per tutto il paese

translation.en: to protect the farmers.
The government will protect the farmers.
Terrorists have attacked America.
You must have heard it.
All the markets are in free fall.
translation.it: Tutti i mercati sono in caduta libera.

translation.en: All these government debts being recalled.
translation.it: Tutti i governi vogliono i debiti saldati.

translation.en: Forget about the trees.
Forget about the savings.
When these rains stop and the sun returns,
translation.it: Quando la pioggia si fermerà e tornerà il sole,

translation.en: Malawi is preparing for a very long hungry season.
translation.it: il Malawi si preparerà ad una lunga stagione di carestia.

translation.en: [Trywell in English] The roots are all weak,
and now the sun is drying out the land,
translation.it: ed ora il sole sta asciugando la terra,

translation.en: but when the president comes to Kasungu, there will be journalists there,
translation.it: ma quando arriverà il presidente a Kasungu, ci saranno i giornalisti,

translation.en: and other chiefs.
You could say something.
[in Chichewa] We can't threaten the president.
[Trywell in Chichewa] It's not threats.
We have to protect ourselves.
[in English] You just let them know that we know what is happening.
translation.it: Devi far loro sapere che sappiamo cosa sta accadendo.

translation.en: [man] Do you think the government will leave everyone here to die?
translation.it: Pensi che il governo ci lascerà tutti qui a morire?

translation.en: [Trywell in Chichewa] I don't know,
but why should we sit here waiting to find out?
translation.it: ma perché stiamo seduti qui ad aspettare di scoprirlo?

translation.en: [in Chichewa] There was a problem before, 20 years ago.
translation.it: C'è stato un problema 20 anni fa.

translation.en: People ran out of food.
Chief fed them with what he could.
translation.it: Il capo diede loro da mangiare.

translation.en: He saved a lot of people.
He'll make sure it doesn't get that bad again.
translation.it: Si assicurerà che non accada mai più.

translation.en: And if our harvest is okay,
translation.it: E se il raccolto andrà bene,

translation.en: we'll finish paying for William's schooling.
translation.it: finiremo di pagare la scuola di William.

translation.en: And university?
I don't know.
How did you know Papa was the man you'd marry?
translation.it: Come hai fatto a capire che papà era l'uomo che avresti sposato?

translation.en: Is someone talking to you?
No, I'm just curious.
There's no one for you in Wimbe.
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno per te a Wimbe.

translation.en: I know.
Annie, we'll get you off to university.
You won't just be a wife and mother.
translation.it: Non sarai solo moglie e madre.

translation.en: No one's been talking?
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno che ti corteggia?

translation.en: No one's been talking.
[William in English] I found another battery.
It's dead, but if you take out the bad cells,
translation.it: È morta, ma se tiri fuori le celle scariche

translation.en: and connect the positive and negative with this one,
translation.it: e connetti il positivo e il negativo con questa,

translation.en: we can make a good battery.
But it needs to charge. It needs electricity.
translation.it: Ma deve essere caricata. Serve l'elettricità.

translation.en: With electricity, we can fix the pump.
translation.it: Con l'elettricità possiamo sistemare la pompa.

translation.en: We never know what's happening with the rain.
translation.it: Non si sa mai cosa può accadere con la pioggia.

translation.en: [Gilbert] What are you doing?
[William] All I have to do is skip assembly. I'll only go to science class for now.
translation.it: Devo saltare l'assemblea. Andrò solo alla lezione di scienze.

translation.en: Class, make sure your homework of exercise three
translation.it: Classe, voglio che i compiti dell'esercizio tre

translation.en: is on my desk at 9 a.m. tomorrow morning.
[William] Mr. Kachigunda.
[Mr. Kachigunda] William.
When you turn the wheel on your bike, the light shines.
translation.it: Quando muove le ruote della bicicletta la luce si accende.

translation.en: -Yes. -How?
A dynamo.
How does a dynamo work?
There's a little man on the inside who rubs his hands together...
translation.it: C'è un omino dentro che si sfrega le mani...

translation.en: It's, uh, magnets.
-Where can I find a dynamo? -You should try the trading center.
translation.it: -Dove posso trovare una dinamo? -Puoi provare al mercato.

translation.en: I'm not sure if they'll have one there. Mine came from Lilongwe.
translation.it: Non sono sicuro se la troverai. La mia viene da Lilongwe.

translation.en: Well, what would I need to make one?
translation.it: Bene, cosa mi serve per farne una?

translation.en: I'm not sure exactly. A few things.
translation.it: Non lo so con precisone. Alcune cose.

translation.en: Uh, a magnet, wiring, something to break the magnetic field.
translation.it: Magneti, cavi, qualcosa che rompa il campo magnetico.

translation.en: If you try the library, maybe you will find something there.
translation.it: Se provi in biblioteca forse puoi trovare qualcosa.

translation.en: I don't have a library card.
translation.it: Non ho la tessera della biblioteca.

translation.en: Because your parents haven't paid.
translation.it: Perché i tuoi genitori non hanno pagato?

translation.en: How do you know I will not tell Mr. Ofesi that you're coming to my class?
translation.it: Come sai che non dirò al Sig. Ofesi che vieni alle lezioni?

translation.en: Because I can keep a secret, sir.
translation.it: Perché so tenere un segreto, signore.

translation.en: A secret?
Yes, sir.
There is a man who comes to my village to see my sister...
translation.it: C'è un uomo che viene al mio villaggio per vedere mia sorella...

translation.en: sir.
-[woman] Mr. Kachigunda. -Mrs. Sikelo.
This is William Kamkwamba. He's part of my science class.
translation.it: Questo è William Kamkwamba. Fa parte della mia classe di scienze.

translation.en: He's no longer a student here,
but he and I have been working on various experiments,
translation.it: ma abbiamo lavorato insieme a diversi esperimenti

translation.en: and I'd like for him to continue his studies here in the library.
translation.it: e vorrei che potesse continuare i suoi studi in biblioteca.

translation.en: -Does Mr. Ofesi know about this? -Of course.
Mr. Ofesi's only stipulation
is the boy is not to be taught or assisted by you or any other teacher.
translation.it: è che il ragazzo non venga assistito da lei né da altri insegnanti.

translation.en: It's important to him that the boy working here
translation.it: È importante che il fatto che il ragazzo studi qui

translation.en: is not common knowledge.
He himself would prefer not to be reminded of the fact.
translation.it: Lui stesso preferisce che non gli si venga ricordato.

translation.en: Of course.
-Good luck. -Thank you, sir.
Perhaps you should sit away from the window.
translation.it: Forse dovresti sederti lontano dalla finestra.

translation.en: Ms. Sikelo.
Mr. Kamkwamba.
Are there any books on dynamos?
Dynamos?
Magnets and electricity?
Is this in your class grade?
translation.it: Siete già a questi argomenti in classe?

translation.en: Maybe I can work with a dictionary.
translation.it: Magari posso lavorare con un dizionario.

translation.en: All the senior textbooks are on the bottom shelf on the left.
translation.it: Tutti i testi per le superiori sono nella parte inferiore a sinistra.

translation.en: [Mrs. Sikelo] Mr. Kamkwamba? Did you find what you were looking for?
translation.it: Signor Kamkwamba? Hai trovato quello che cercavi?

translation.en: -Welcome, Mr. President. -Thank you very much. How are you?
Thank you for coming Mr. President. Welcome.
translation.it: Grazie per essere venuto, signor Presidente. Benvenuto.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Thank you, thank you.
Clap your hands and cheer.
People, I'm saying N.U.P.
[crowd] Government!
Say it three times.
[in English] Uh, but first of all, I'd like to thank you, Your Excellency,
translation.it: Ma prima di tutto voglio ringraziare Sua Eccellenza

translation.en: for honoring the inauguration of Chief Mamba.
translation.it: per averci onorato all'inaugurazione del Capo Mamba.

translation.en: Can you please stand, Chief?
[in Chichewa] And now I'll leave the mic to Chief Wimbe.
translation.it: Ed ora lascio il microfono al Capo Wimbe.

translation.en: [in English] Your Excellency,
may I first congratulate you on your achievements in government,
translation.it: prima di tutto voglio congratularmi per il traguardo nel governo,

translation.en: and state that I hope in the coming election,
translation.it: e dire che spero che le prossime elezioni

translation.en: you will emerge victorious.
You have been a key factor in our peace and stability,
translation.it: Lei è stato un fattore chiave della pace e della stabilità

translation.en: when we have seen the responsibility of government
translation.it: quando abbiamo visto la responsabilità del governo

translation.en: devolve into chaos across Africa.
translation.it: trasformarsi in caos in tutta l'Africa.

translation.en: However, the recent floods have created a dangerous situation.
translation.it: Tuttavia, le recenti alluvioni hanno creato una situazione pericolosa.

translation.en: In many regions, we already know the harvest will fail.
translation.it: In molte regioni, sappiamo già che il raccolto sarà un fallimento.

translation.en: We know the economic machinery is not pointed towards us,
translation.it: Sappiamo che la macchina dell'economia non punta verso di noi,

translation.en: but we are now a democracy.
translation.it: ma ora noi siamo una democrazia.

translation.en: We are prepared to make our voices heard in the ballot box.
translation.it: Siamo pronti a fare sentire le nostre voci alle urne.

translation.en: -What is this man trying to do? -We need an assurance of emergency grain.
translation.it: -Cosa sta cercando di fare? -Ci serve del grano per le emergenze.

translation.en: We need to know any food issue will be slaughtered in its infancy.
translation.it: Ci serve sapere che ogni problema sul cibo verrà stroncato sul nascere.

translation.en: We need a government prepared to support its people.
translation.it: Ci serve un governo pronto a supportare il suo popolo.

translation.en: I want to vote for this government,
but cannot vote for any man
translation.it: ma non posso votare per un uomo

translation.en: who will turn two blind eyes to a catastrophe.
translation.it: che chiuderà gli occhi di fronte ad una catastrofe.

translation.en: [man] Democracy at work. Freedom of expression.
translation.it: In quanto democrazia libertà di espressione.

translation.en: Well, His Excellency will address this misunderstanding,
translation.it: Bene, Sua Eccellenza si occuperà del malinteso,

translation.en: but for now, let's have some music.
translation.it: ma per ora mettiamo un po' di musica.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Father! Father!
[in Chichewa] Why don't they take him to a clinic?
translation.it: Perché non lo portano in ospedale?

translation.en: He's safer here.
Would they come back?
We don't know.
You have to be a man now, William.
translation.it: Devi essere un uomo ora, William.

translation.en: No one is coming to help us.
I need you to work with me on this harvest.
translation.it: Ho bisogno che lavori con me al raccolto.

translation.en: For every piece of grain we can get.
translation.it: Per ogni pezzo di grano che riusciamo a raccogliere.

translation.en: Yes, sir.
[man] Trywell.
[in Chichewa] Is that all there is?
It's not even five bags.
Sixty days.
[Trywell] Sixty to seventy.
[Agnes] With a year till the next harvest.
translation.it: E un anno al prossimo raccolto.

translation.en: It's not enough.
We have savings.
It's not enough.
[in Chichewa] The government is denying a food crisis.
translation.it: Il governo nega la crisi alimentare.

translation.en: What?
-They won't admit it's happening. -[man speaking in Chichewa on radio]
The corrupt government is only interested
translation.it: Il governo corrotto è interessato solo

translation.en: in securing victory in the coming election.
translation.it: ad assicurarsi la vittoria alle prossime elezioni.

translation.en: We demand assurances from our leadership.
Tell us who will support our communities when the food runs out?
translation.it: Diteci chi ci supporterà quando il cibo sarà terminato.

translation.en: There's an opposition rally in Nkhata Bay.
translation.it: C'è una manifestazione dell'opposizione a Nkhata Bay.

translation.en: -They're getting a truck. -Another rally?
The opposition can put pressure on the government.
translation.it: L'opposizione può fare pressione al governo.

translation.en: -Where can we get the best price? -I'll take care of it.
translation.it: -Dove posso ottenere il prezzo migliore? -Ci penso io.

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -[Agnes] You're going?
The government doesn't want us to make noise.
translation.it: Il governo non vuole che ci facciamo sentire.

translation.en: The opposition people need our support.
translation.it: Quelli dell'opposizione hanno bisogno del nostro supporto.

translation.en: Make noise here if you want to make noise. Stay with your family.
translation.it: Fatti sentire qui, se vuoi. Rimani con la tua famiglia.

translation.en: We'll be back tonight. Tomorrow at the latest.
translation.it: Saremo di ritorno stasera. Domani al massimo.

translation.en: We need to make sure people know what's happening here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo assicurarci che la gente sappia cosa sta accadendo.

translation.en: [Mrs. Sikelo in English] So, you use the windmill to charge the battery?
translation.it: Quindi usi il mulinello per ricaricare la batteria?

translation.en: And the battery powers a pump.
translation.it: E la batteria fa funzionare la pompa.

translation.en: We can plant in the dry season. Two harvests.
translation.it: Possiamo piantare anche con la stagione secca. Due raccolti.

translation.en: We can plant now and we won't run out of food.
translation.it: Possiamo piantare adesso e non restare senza cibo.

translation.en: With Mr. Kachigunda's dynamo, I can do it.
translation.it: Con la dinamo del Sig. Kachigunda posso farcela.

translation.en: Go to his class.
Ask him.
I don't want you staying in this village anymore.
translation.it: Non voglio che tu rimanga ancora in questo villaggio.

translation.en: Not with all of these problems.
Where do you want me to go?
I have people in Mangochi.
We can travel there and marry.
You want me to run away?
You want me to disgrace my family?
translation.it: Vuoi che disonori la mia famiglia?

translation.en: I love you. I don't know what's more important than this.
translation.it: Ti amo. Non so cosa sia più importante di questo.

translation.en: We can come back when I can pay them a bride price.
translation.it: Possiamo tornare quando potrò pagare il prezzo per averti in sposa.

translation.en: We'll do everything right then. I promise.
Can you pay them a bride price now?
There's no money for teachers.
translation.it: Non ci sono soldi per gli insegnanti.

translation.en: So many students are leaving because of the harvest.
translation.it: Molti studenti se ne vanno a causa del raccolto.

translation.en: They may close the school.
There's nothing here for us. There's nothing in Wimbe.
translation.it: Non c'è nulla qui per noi. Non c'è nulla a Wimbe.

translation.en: Nothing for you.
-You should go back to school. -I don't care about school.
translation.it: -Dovresti tornare a scuola. -Non mi importa della scuola.

translation.en: We can leave now. I can arrange it. Annie.
translation.it: Possiamo andare via ora. Posso occuparmene io. Annie!

translation.en: -Annie. -How can I go to Mangochi?
I can't even speak Yao.
They speak English in Mangochi, and you can learn Yao.
translation.it: Puoi parlare in inglese a Mangochi, e poi imparare lo Yao.

translation.en: [Mr. Ofesi] Class, I'll be taking your science lesson this morning.
translation.it: Classe, oggi farò io la vostra lezione di scienze.

translation.en: Stand up.
My father will pay, sir.
You are stealing from the family of every remaining student in this school.
translation.it: Stai rubando alle famiglie degli altri studenti della scuola.

translation.en: My father will pay, sir.
You're stealing from myself and from every member of faculty.
translation.it: Stai rubando a me e a tutti i membri della facoltà.

translation.en: My father will pay.
You're expelled from Kachokolo,
and you will never be allowed to study here again
translation.it: e non ti sarà più permesso studiare qui

translation.en: or any school in this district.
translation.it: né in altre scuole di questo distretto.

translation.en: -Collect your things and go. -Mr. Ofesi.
translation.it: -Prendi le tue cose e vai. -Sig. Ofesi.

translation.en: Collect your things and go!
translation.it: Prendi le tue cose e vai!

translation.en: [Mr. Ofesi] There's nothing I can do about it, Mrs. Sikelo.
translation.it: Non posso farci niente, Signora Sikelo.

translation.en: I cannot ignore him sneaking into the school.
translation.it: Non posso ignorare il fatto che sgattaiola a scuola di nascosto.

translation.en: But he was not sneaking into the school.
translation.it: Ma lui non sgattaiola a scuola.

translation.en: Don't you see, Mr. Ofesi?
Can you not see that he's been sneaking out of the fields?
translation.it: Non vede che sgattaiola via dai campi?

translation.en: [Agnes in Chichewa] Have you seen your sister?
They caught you at school?
-You knew I was going? -Of course.
They expelled me.
-What's happening? -They're taking grain to Chamama. To sell.
It's a government truck. They're not leaving us to starve.
translation.it: È il camion del governo. Non ci lasceranno morire di fame.

translation.en: Buy grain. As much as you can.
translation.it: Compra il grano. Più che puoi.

translation.en: It's government price, not market price. It's cheaper.
translation.it: Al prezzo del governo, non del mercato. È più basso.

translation.en: Aah! No, take the bike.
Take the bike. [panting]
[shouts in English] Khamba, stay! It's too far.
translation.it: Khamba, resta lì. È troppo lontano.

translation.en: -[dog barks] -Khamba, stay.
[in Chichewa] Grain! Grain! Grain!
[in Chichewa] Stop!
Let's go back.
-[in Chichewa] Where were you? -[Annie] Seeing a friend.
Which friend?
You think I don't see you sneaking out of here?
translation.it: Pensi che non ti veda quando esci di nascosto?

translation.en: At night even?
-I've told you-- -[Agnes] I know.
What?
There's no one for me in Wimbe.
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno per me a Wimbe.

translation.en: There's nothing for me in Wimbe.
translation.it: Non c'è niente per me a Wimbe.

translation.en: So if there's nothing for me in Wimbe, why should I stay in Wimbe?
translation.it: Allora se non c'è niente per me a Wimbe perché dovrei restare qui?

translation.en: How can I stay?
-Who are you going with? -That's not what I'm saying.
You want to disgrace your family?
You don't understand.
What do you think you know that I don't?
translation.it: Cosa pensi di sapere che io non sappia già?

translation.en: Madam, I haven't eaten in two days.
translation.it: Signora, non mangio da due giorni.

translation.en: Get out.
I don't want to hurt anyone.
translation.it: Non voglio far del male a nessuno.

translation.en: -They said to see the Chief... -[baby crying]
translation.it: Hanno detto di vedere il Capo,

translation.en: but he's dying.
[in Chichewa] How much can they have? There were only two trucks.
translation.it: Quanto possono avere? C'erano solo due camion.

translation.en: [man in Chichewa] Back in line! Back in line!
There will not be enough for everyone today.
translation.it: Non ce ne sarà a sufficienza per tutti, oggi.

translation.en: I can only give you fifteen kilos.
[in Chichewa] I told you not to go!
translation.it: Te l'avevo detto di non andare!

translation.en: -What happened? -I told you not to go!
-I told you not to go! -[Trywell] Where's William?
[Agnes] I don't know.
[Trywell] William! Where's William?
[man in Chichewa] We can't just stay here. We'll need to open the door.
translation.it: Non possiamo restare qui. Dobbiamo aprire le porte.

translation.en: You'll have to run.
Sir.
Can you help me?
Please.
[in Chichewa] We can have one meal a day.
translation.it: Possiamo fare un solo pasto al giorno.

translation.en: We should decide which one.
This is crazy.
Supper.
You can't sleep on an empty stomach.
translation.it: Non si può dormire a stomaco vuoto.

translation.en: Breakfast.
Why?
I like breakfast.
-My God! -Annie!
You don't raise your voice to your father.
translation.it: Non alzare la voce con tuo padre.

translation.en: He left us here.
We could have been raped and killed. If it wasn't for William--
translation.it: Potevamo essere stuprate e uccise. Se non fosse stato per William...

translation.en: Your father was trying to save us.
translation.it: Tuo padre sta cercando di salvarci.

translation.en: -There's no food! -And so?
You think I'd let you starve to death?
translation.it: Pensi che vi lascerò morire di fame?

translation.en: When I cut off my own arm to feed you,
translation.it: Quando mi taglierò un braccio per darvi da mangiare

translation.en: then you'll know that you're my child.
translation.it: allora capirete che siete i miei figli.

translation.en: Tomorrow, we'll dig ridges and start planting.
translation.it: Domani scaveremo e inizieremo a piantare.

translation.en: [man] The ground is too hard. It's the dry season.
translation.it: Il suolo è troppo duro. Siamo nella stagione secca.

translation.en: Nothing will grow.
[Trywell] Then...
we pray for rain.
Dear Father,
fight for this family.
-Bring us rain in this dry season-- -Trywell.
Stop.
Eat, Papa.
If you give any food to that dog,
translation.it: Se dai del cibo a quel cane,

translation.en: I'll break your neck.
[softly] Annie. Annie.
-What is it? -I need you to speak to Mr. Kachigunda.
I know you're talking to Mr. Kachigunda.
I need to use the dynamo from his bike.
translation.it: Mi serve la dinamo della sua bici.

translation.en: -The dynamo? -You have to help me, Annie.
Tell him he has to let me use the dynamo.
translation.it: Digli che deve lasciarmi usare la sua dinamo.

translation.en: I can fix a water pump. I know how to do it.
translation.it: Posso aggiustare la pompa dell'acqua, so come fare.

translation.en: I can bring water. I can make rain.
translation.it: Posso portare l'acqua. Posso far piovere.

translation.en: But I need the dynamo.
[in Chichewa] Mama, what happened?
[sobbing] She's gone with teacher.
Did you see her? Did you see her?
[William] No, sir.
Are you lying to me?
-Where did they go? -I don't know, sir.
Bring me my daughter, William.
-I don't know, sir. I don't know! -Bring me my daughter!
[in English] "One less."
She says, "One less."
"One less mouth to feed."
[in English] I'll do everything I can to find an address, but right now--
translation.it: Farò tutto ciò che posso per trovare un indirizzo, ma ora...

translation.en: We have no money to go to Mangochi.
translation.it: Non abbiamo soldi per andare a Mangochi.

translation.en: I'll do my best to locate Mr. Kachigunda.
translation.it: Farò del mio meglio per rintracciare il Sig. Kachigunda.

translation.en: Your best?
I'm sorry, we're closing the school for the moment.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, stiamo chiudendo la scuola per il momento.

translation.en: There are not enough students or teachers.
translation.it: Non ci sono abbastanza studenti o insegnanti.

translation.en: -Is Ms. Sikelo still here? -No.
This hunger will be the last one,
for me and my family, believe me.
translation.it: per me e la mia famiglia, mi creda.

translation.en: We'll never go through something like this again.
translation.it: Non passeremo mai più nulla del genere.

translation.en: [Agnes] He's starving himself.
translation.it: Si sta facendo morire di fame.

translation.en: Killing himself.
So he doesn't take food from these children.
translation.it: Per lasciare più cibo ai suoi figli.

translation.en: Mrs. Kamkwamba--
When we were first married, we promised each other
translation.it: Quando ci siamo sposati avevamo promesso l'un l'altra

translation.en: that we would never pray for rain like our ancestors.
translation.it: che non avremmo mai pregato per la pioggia come i nostri antenati.

translation.en: We said we were modern people,
translation.it: Ci eravamo detti che eravamo persone moderne,

translation.en: and our children would go to school.
translation.it: e i nostri figli sarebbero andati a scuola.

translation.en: And this is here that Annie met teacher,
translation.it: Ed è qui che Annie ha conosciuto l'insegnante,

translation.en: and we paid for it.
-And you even expelled my son. -Not me, Mrs. Kamkwamba.
translation.it: -E poi lei ha espulso mio figlio. -Non io, signora Kamkwamba.

translation.en: -The government-- -Which government?
The government that beat our chief?
translation.it: Il governo che ha sconfitto il nostro capo?

translation.en: Even if they prayed for rain, the ancestors survived
translation.it: Anche se pregavano per la pioggia, i nostri antenati sopravvivevano

translation.en: because they stayed together.
When do we stay together, Mr. Headmaster?
translation.it: Noi quando staremo uniti, Sig. Preside?

translation.en: What can I do, Mrs. Kamkwamba?
Can I use the library?
[in Chichewa] What's all this?
[in English] An experiment.
In America, electricity made from wind.
translation.it: In America, l'elettricità viene fatta dal vento.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] With electricity, we can make water.
[in English] We're going to build a windmill.
We need to build a small one first, to see if it works.
translation.it: Dobbiamo farne uno piccolo prima, per vedere se funziona.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] All I ate today was pigskin from the drum.
translation.it: Oggi ho mangiato solo della pelle di maiale da un bidone.

translation.en: Don't waste my time.
What do we do?
It has a motor inside. [in English] It turns the cassette tape.
translation.it: Dentro c'è un motore. Fa girare la cassetta.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] How are you doing with those blades?
translation.it: Cosa ci fai con quelle lame?

translation.en: [man in Chichewa] I'm almost there.
[in Chichewa] Okay, open the door.
[boys together in Chichewa] ♪ It's a clever bird ♪
♪ It builds its nest ♪
♪ To protect the others... ♪
[William in Chichewa] Papa.
I want to show you something.
Can you hear it?
What is it?
It's wind energy.
The blades make electricity,
and that powers the radio.
I see.
I want to build a big one. A big one could power a water pump.
translation.it: Voglio costruirne uno più grande. Così da far funzionare la pompa dell'acqua.

translation.en: It means that even if the land is dry,
translation.it: Significa che anche se la terra è secca,

translation.en: we can still plant.
It can do that?
Yes.
But to build a big one,
translation.it: Ma per costruirne uno più grande,

translation.en: I'll need something to help turn the blades.
translation.it: Mi serve qualcosa che aiuti a far girare le pale.

translation.en: If I could use your bike, it would work.
translation.it: Se potessi usare la tua bici, funzionerebbe.

translation.en: The bike?
It would work.
How long would you need it for?
I'd need to remove the wheels and cut the frame.
translation.it: Dovrei rimuovere le ruote e tagliare i raggi.

translation.en: You couldn't use it as a bike anymore.
translation.it: Non potresti più usarla come bici.

translation.en: What?
Have you seen what's happening, William?
translation.it: Hai visto cosa sta succedendo, William?

translation.en: Yes, sir.
-People are dying. Do you understand? -This will help everyone.
translation.it: -La gente muore. Lo capisci? -Questo aiuterà tutti.

translation.en: Get this stupidness away from me.
-Papa-- -Get this stupidness away from me!
Papa, I need to take the bike so I can bring electricity.
translation.it: Papà, devo prendere la bici per fare l'elettricità.

translation.en: With electricity, I can make water. I can make rain.
translation.it: Con l'elettricità posso portare l'acqua, posso far piovere.

translation.en: Are you still talking?
There are things I know that you don't know.
translation.it: Ci sono cose che io so e tu no.

translation.en: Because you can make toys?
Because of school.
From now on, you get up with me first thing in the morning, understand?
translation.it: D'ora in poi al mattino ti alzerai presto con me, capito?

translation.en: You help me build these ridges.
Forget about school! Forget about the library!
translation.it: Dimentica la scuola! Dimentica la biblioteca!

translation.en: I don't want to see you near this foolishness again!
translation.it: Non voglio più vederti con queste stupidaggini.

translation.en: I was wrong!
It's damn well time you learned how to farm!
translation.it: È ora che impari a coltivare!

translation.en: Plow the land!
Plow the land!
-[in English] Are you okay? -It's too hot.
Look at the sky.
It won't rain. It won't rain for months.
translation.it: Non pioverà. Non pioverà per mesi.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Do you think the Gule Wamkulu will come when my father dies?
translation.it: Pensi che i Gule Wamkulu verranno quando mio padre morirà?

translation.en: Even though there's a hunger?
They're supposed to come when a chief dies.
translation.it: Devono venire quando muore un capo.

translation.en: -Let's go. -Where?
[in Chichewa] What's happening?
We have to go north while we still can. There's nothing left.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare a nord finché possiamo. Non c'è rimasto niente.

translation.en: I need your help.
-[in English] If we stay, we die. -No.
We find another bike and we build the windmill.
translation.it: Troveremo un'altra bicicletta e costruiremo il mulino a vento.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] You're mad. A bike from where?
There's no one in the trading center. Everyone is leaving the village.
translation.it: Al mercato non ce ne sono. Se ne stanno andando tutti.

translation.en: -[in English] It was a toy, William. -It's not a toy. I showed you.
translation.it: -Era un giocattolo, William. -Non è un giocattolo. Avete visto.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] What if there's no food in the north?
translation.it: E se a nord non ci fosse cibo?

translation.en: [in English] You'll die.
[in Chichewa] If you're sure it will work, William,
translation.it: Se sei così sicuro che funzioni, William,

translation.en: why don't you just take your father's bike?
translation.it: perché non prendi la bici di tuo padre?

translation.en: Why don't you just take it?
translation.it: Perché non la prendi e basta?

translation.en: Papa.
[in Chichewa] What's this?
We need to take the bike, Papa.
[in English] You want to fight me?
We don't want to fight you, Trywell. We just want you to give William the bike.
translation.it: Non vogliamo batterci, Trywell. Vogliamo che William abbia la bici.

translation.en: Get away from my house.
-He can bring water. -You say.
[in Chichewa] I can bring water.
-All year round. -You're a big man now, huh?
[in English] Big men.
Fight me.
[in Chichewa] Do it!
I'm your father!
I'm your father!
[William in English] Wait.
[in Chichewa] Come with us, William. Let's leave.
[William in English] I can't.
I have to go home.
I need to be with my father.
translation.it: Mio padre ha bisogno di me.

translation.en: [in English] Khamba, come.
[voice trembles] Khamba.
[Trywell in Chichewa] He tried to fight me,
translation.it: Ha provato a battersi con me,

translation.en: with his friends,
for the bike.
Will you give it to him?
Of course not.
How much should I lose, Trywell?
Everywhere I followed you,
I lost something.
My parents,
when I came here.
Then the land.
Then we lost Annie.
You're blaming me?
I'm not blaming you.
translation.it: Non sto dando la colpa a te.

translation.en: I'm asking you.
When do we stop losing?
Nothing we have done has worked.
translation.it: Niente di ciò che abbiamo fatto ha funzionato.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] John said we'd grow tobacco.
translation.it: John ha detto che avremmo coltivato tabacco.

translation.en: Tobacco that looked like milk chocolate,
translation.it: Tabacco simile a cioccolato al latte,

translation.en: for 2,000 kwacha a kilo.
I'm sorry, Papa.
Sometimes it's dreams,
and sometimes it's just lies.
It's not a dream, Papa.
I'm not dreaming.
That's why he didn't leave the land to me.
translation.it: Ecco perché non ha lasciato la terra a me.

translation.en: He didn't trust me.
He never did.
He knew I'd fail.
Like I have.
You didn't fail me. Never.
translation.it: Con me non hai fallito. Mai.

translation.en: I went to school.
Water?
Yes, sir.
From wind?
It can work,
if you help me.
Okay.
[in English] You can bring it up. I'm ready.
[Trywell in Chichewa] Have you got it?
Be careful, William.
[in English] It needs to charge. The battery needs to charge.
translation.it: Deve caricarsi. Le batterie devono caricarsi.

translation.en: [in Chichewa] Go to the chief's house and bring seeds. We'll plant vegetables.
translation.it: Andate a casa del capo e prendete i semi, piantiamo le verdure.

translation.en: We'll get through while we wait for the grain to grow.
translation.it: Ce le faremo bastare mentre aspettiamo che cresca il grano.

translation.en: [in English] Go to them, Gilbert.
[in Chichewa] Mrs. Sikelo wants to bring the new government's representative
translation.it: La Signora Sikelo vuole portare il nuovo rappresentante

translation.en: for the schools district to see the windmill.
translation.it: del distretto scolastico a vedere il mio mulino a vento.

translation.en: She says there may be a scholarship for a school in Madisi.
translation.it: Dice che potrebbe esserci una borsa di studio a Madisi.

translation.en: I think I should stay here.
At least till Annie comes back.
I think I should stay and help you with the land.
translation.it: Penso che dovrei restare e aiutarti con la terra.

translation.en: I've been thinking about this machine, William.
translation.it: Ho pensato a questa macchina, William.

translation.en: I've been thinking about how it will carry you away
translation.it: Ho pensato a come possa permetterti di andare via

translation.en: and keep you here at the same time.
translation.it: e farti restare allo stesso tempo.

translation.en: Because no one can see this thing and not think of you.
translation.it: Perché nessuno può guardarla senza pensare a te.

translation.en: No one would want to.
Wherever you are.
Go to school.
